nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, a Confederacy of Independent Systems fleet protected Serenno, the homeworld of Count Dooku and leader of the Confederacy. The fleet consisted of at least five DH-Omni Support Vessels, at least sixteen C-9979 landing crafts, at least thirty Munificent-class star frigates, at least two Recusant-class light destroyers, and at least one Providence-class Dreadnought.

The fleet consisted of several different classes of ships, consisting of at least one Providence-class Dreadnought, at least two Recusant-class light destroyers, and at least thirty Munificent-class star frigates. It also consisted of at least five DH-Omni Support Vessels and at least sixteen C-9979 landing crafts.
The fleet first appeared in "Massacre", the nineteenth episode of the animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' fourth season, which originally aired on February 24, 2012.
